trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Utica
There were no other sightings in Utica on or around April 25th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside smoking a cigarette as usual..looking at the stars been doing that ever since I was a kid. SO I know the difference between one thing or the other. And there it was an object boomerang shape just passing right on front of me NO SOUND at all light were a bit visible but very difficult to see..it was like greyish..almost like white pearl..but it was there. I was very surprise to see so low I think about a 1,000 feet hight. I'm pretty sure. A beautifull sight.
Summary: No sound at all! The thing was huge boomerang shape just beatifull..almost undetectable.
